column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with us this weekend. If you're open to it
column2: we would love to hear more about your experience this weekend. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
